comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Those have also been whitelisted. There’s an open issue for this; I basically need to set up a cron job or something that automatically whitelists tomorrow’s dailies on reset.

comments.author: zeeZ.5713
comments.body: Looks like the new daily jumping puzzle and adventure achievements in general need a whitelisting. Today’s 1914, tomorrow’s 1887, 1926 and 1898 and 2988 from a couple days ago all show up as “no such ID”.
